description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in BinaryCarpenter Ultimate Custom Add To Cart Button (Ajax) For WooCommerce by Binary Carpenter allows Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).This issue affects Ultimate Custom Add To Cart Button (Ajax) For WooCommerce by Binary Carpenter: from n/a through 1.222.16.

product.name: Ultimate Custom Add To Cart Button (Ajax) For WooCommerce by Binary Carpenter
